reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app collects various types of personal information.
reply.reference: In our journey to offer exceptional therapy and coaching services, we gather various types of information: Personal Identification Details, Sensitive Health Information, Financial Transactions, Digital Footprints. URL: https://www.progressmagic.com/privacy-policy

source_documents.excerpt:
At Progress Magic, we deeply value the trust you place in us when you use our therapy and coaching services. This Privacy Policy is a testament to our dedication to safeguarding your personal information and respecting your privacy rights. It's tailored to meet the high standards set by Singapore's Personal Data Protection Act(PDPA), the EU's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), and other relevant privacy laws.
1. Understanding the Data We Collect
In our journey to offer exceptional therap...

Our Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information. It also explains your rights regarding your personal information and how you can exercise them. We aim to be transparent about our data practices and respect your privacy preferences.
Please understand that this Privacy Policy does not constitute a contract between you and Progress Magic nor does it create any legal rights or obligations. It serves as a declarati...

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects Personal Identification Details, Sensitive Health Information, Financial Transactions, and Digital Footprints.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly outlines the types of data collected by the app, ranging from personal identification details to digital footprints, indicating a broad range of data collection practices.
reply.reference: Personal Identification Details: Your name, contact information, and professional details are the keystones that help us personalize our services. Sensitive Health Information: We understand the delicacy of mental health and therapy details you share with us and we treat this data with the utmost care. Financial Transactions: Your payment and billing information are crucial for seamless service delivery, and we handle these with high-security standards. Digital Footprints: As you navigate our platform, technical data like IP addresses and usage statistics are collected to enhance your user experience. URL: https://www.progressmagic.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the multiple purposes for using personal information, such as personal identification and professional communication, processing orders, analyzing user experience, and managing disputes among others.
reply.reference: We utilize your personal information for several key purposes: Personal identification and professional communication, Processing orders, subscriptions, and payment transactions, Administrative record-keeping, Conducting internal analyses, Managing disputes. URL: https://www.progressmagic.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can opt out of data collection or request the deletion of their personal information under specific circumstances or according to their preferences.
reply.reference: You may request the deletion of your personal information under certain circumstances, such as when the information is no longer necessary, or if you withdraw your consent. Upon such a request, we will delete your information within a reasonable timeframe. URL: https://www.progressmagic.com/privacy-policy

- Objection: You can object to our processing of your personal information, particularly for data processed based on our legitimate interests. If you do object, please provide your reasons, so we can evaluate whether we have a prevailing interest to continue processing.
- Choice/Opt-Out of Marketing Communications: At any time, you can opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us. Transactional or service communicatio...

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that certain personal information is shared with third-party service providers under strict confidentiality agreements to support the functionality of the platform.
reply.reference: Personal Information is shared with third-party service providers under strict confidentiality agreements. URL: https://www.progressmagic.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with SiteGround, top-tier cloud services, Mailchimp, Stripe, and other third-party service providers.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy outlines the specific third-party service providers with whom the app shares data, ensuring transparency and clarity.
reply.reference: Hosting Provider for Our Website: SiteGround, Hosting Provider for the App: top-tier cloud services for security and performance, Email Marketing Provider: Mailchimp, Payment Service Provider: Stripe, Analytical Service Provider: Google Analytics, URL: https://www.progressmagic.com/privacy-policy
